summary: This bill, the Archie Cavanaugh Migratory Bird Treaty Amendment Act, amends the Migratory Bird Treaty Act to clarify the treatment of authentic Alaska Native articles of handicraft containing nonedible migratory bird parts. It defines 'authentic Alaska Native article of handicraft' and specifies that the act does not prohibit activities involving these items. It also mandates the Secretary of State and Secretary of the Interior to work with international partners and modify regulations to implement the changes.
